item.title: Fundamental Principles
item.description: Article 1. The Federative Republic of Brazil is made up of the indissoluble union of the states and municipalities and of the Federal District. It is a legal democratic state founded on: sovereignty citizenship human dignity social values of labour and of the free enterprise political pluralism All power emanates from the people, who exercise it by means of elected representatives or directly, as provided by this Constitution.
